ProductInfo.Features:
Our Latest Android Tablet PC comes with a Capacitive Screen and a variety of exciting functions. This 9" Tablet allows you to stay connected on the beat. It is sleek and easy to use. With the new Android 4.2.2 operating system, your options are endless.
This tablet performance and speed are better than the regular tablets in the market. This is owing to the new Allwinner Dual Core A23 CPU and Android 4.2.2 Operating system.
Android 4.2.2 OS reveals tons of new adventures to your Tagital tablet. Get access to thousands of useful apps and fun games to download and install on you tablet with Google Play Store pre-installed. Micro SD card slot allows you to add up to 32GB extra space to store songs, videos, photos and other files.
Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n) keeps you connected on the go. Front-facing camera makes it easy to chat with friends and family, while rear-facing camera allows you to capture the special moments and upload them to facebook and twitter.
4,000mAh Battery, up to 4 hours of surfing the web.
ProductInfo.Name: Tagital® 9" Android 4.2.2 A23 Dual Core Dual Camera Tablet PC Play Store Pre-installed (Enhanced Version of A13)
